title: Lunchbox Offended By Server And Tipped Less! + Bobby Put His Dog On A Treadmill + Amy Gets A Strange DM About ‘TGIF’
itunes:title: Lunchbox Offended By Server And Tipped Less! + Bobby Put His Dog On A Treadmill + Amy Gets A Strange DM About ‘TGIF’
description:
Lunchbox got offended that his server assumed he was eating the hamburger and his wife was having the salad when they went out to dinner. He said it was offensive that they assumed so he tipped less. Bobby got lots of mean comments on Instagram after he posted a video of his dog, Eller, using the treadmill with him in the room. Plus, Amy got a strange DM from a listener who was upset that she didn’t know what the letters in "TGIF" stood for!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
